io.s4.client
类 Driver

java.lang.Object
  io.s4.client.Driver

public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object

S4 Client Driver. Allows S4 Client code to send and receive events from an S4 cluster.

嵌套类摘要

          State of the client.

构造方法详细信息

Driver

public Driver(java.lang.String hostname,
              int port)
Configure driver with Adapter location. Note: this does not create a connection to the adapter.

参数：
hostname - Name of S4 client adapter host.
port - Port on which adapter listens for client connections.
另请参见：
init(), connect()
方法详细信息

setReadMode

public Driver setReadMode(ReadMode m)
Set the read mode, if not already connected.

参数：
m - read mode
返回：
Driver with read mode set to m

readInclude

public Driver readInclude(java.util.List<java.lang.String> s)
Add to set of stream names included for reading, if not already connected.

参数：
s - list of stream names
返回：
Updated driver

ms - timeout in milliseconds

updated driver

getState

public Driver.State getState()
Get the state of the driver.

返回：
state

init

public boolean init()
             throws java.io.IOException
Initialize the driver. Handshake with adapter to receive a unique id, and verify that the driver is compatible with the protocol used by the adapter. This does not actually establish a connection for sending and receiving events.

返回：
true if and only if the adapter issued a valid ID to this client, and the protocol is found to be compatible.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the underlying TCP/IP socket throws an exception.
另请参见：
connect()

connect

public boolean connect()
                throws java.io.IOException
Establish a connection to the adapter. Upon success, this enables the client to send and receive events. The client must first be initialized. Otherwise, this operation will fail.

返回：
true if and only if a connection was successfully established.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the underlying TCP/IP socket throws an exception.
另请参见：
init()

disconnect

public boolean disconnect()
                   throws java.io.IOException
Close the connection to the adapter. Events can no longer be sent or received by the client.

返回：
true upon success. False if the connection is already closed.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the underlying TCP/IP socket throws an exception.

send

public boolean send(Message m)
             throws java.io.IOException
Send a message to the adapter.

参数：
m - message to be sent
返回：
true if and only if the message was successfully sent.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the underlying TCP/IP socket throws an exception.

recv

public Message recv()
             throws java.io.IOException
Receive a message from the adapter. This function blocks till a message becomes available to read. The set of messages sent to this client from S4 depends on the read mode of the client.

返回：
message received from S4 cluster.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the underlying TCP/IP socket throws an exception.
另请参见：
ReadMode

recv

public Message recv(int timeout)
             throws java.io.IOException
Receive a message from the adapter. This function blocks till a message becomes available to read, or till a specified number of milliseconds have elapsed. The set of messages sent to this client from S4 depends on the read mode of the client.

参数：
timeout - timeout in milliseconds
返回：
message received from S4 cluster.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the underlying TCP/IP socket throws an exception.
java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if the read timed out.
另请参见：
ReadMode

recvAll

public java.util.List<Message> recvAll(int t)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Receive the set of message that from the adapter within a specified time interval.

参数：
t - interval in milliseconds
返回：
messages received from S4 cluster.
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if the underlying TCP/IP socket throws an exception.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Reads and prints all events over an interval of 5 seconds from a set of streams specified on the command line.

参数：
argv - list of streams
抛出：
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading from adapter.
